Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerman!

My name is Andrew and I am here to learn and grow in my KSP knowledge. I have been playing INTENSELY for the last two weeks or so after purchasing the game, and man is it addicting. One of the few games that I can play hours on end without just doubling over in boredom.

About myself? I'm only 15 years of age, which surprises most for some reason. I'm a huge car-fanatic. I'm a self-titled computer guy. I also live in Oklahoma, which makes it difficult to find people that share similar interests in computers and physics.

But I digress, anyway, it's very nice to meet all of you and I plan to append and learn from this community!
I have a relative in law near Tulsa, from what my wife tells me of the area, I sympathize with you. Have fun with the game!

Hi Andrew, welcome to the community

Glad to hear you are enjoying the game, it's easy to let the hours slip away when playing KSP
